activities: Mindflash collects limited information from Users in an effort to provide the requested service.  For Users, Mindflash collects an email address, name and password.  These items allow Users to login to their Mindflash account and take training courses.  All data collection is done through a SSL connection.  Users are informed of our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service via links next to the submit button.  Information collected from Users is used to validate their account should they return.  Information collected is not shared with third parties and Users are allowed to remove or change their information at any time.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
